name: Hero Can't Fly
description:
Hero Can't Fly

Hero Can't Fly is a fun jumping game that works on all devices and is extremely easy to play, requiring only a simple press of the finger to control the character to jump higher.

Description

This hero can not fly, you need to help him jump the steps, and always pay attention to the flying boxes to avoid being smashed.

How to Play

Press the screen to help the hero jump higher, release your finger to make the hero move normally to avoid flying boxes or move to other bricks.
